actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend section 109 of the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide that user fees and service charges collected by States and local governments for public services be counted as taxes for purposes of allocating funds under that act.

summary.text: Amends the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act to provide that user fees and service charges collected by States and local governments for public services be counted as taxes for purposes of allocating funds under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 109 of the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to provide that user fees and service charges collected by States and local governments for public services be counted as taxes for purposes of allocating funds under that act.
